description: Known Prisma drift patterns to ignore or sanitize during migration creation

protectedIndexes.name: idx_memories_embedding
protectedIndexes.description: IVFFlat vector index for similarity search - Prisma can't represent Unsupported type indexes
protectedIndexes.recreateSQL: CREATE INDEX "idx_memories_embedding" ON "memories" USING ivfflat ("embedding" vector_cosine_ops) WITH (lists = 50);

protectedIndexes.name: memories_chunk_group_id_idx
protectedIndexes.description: Partial index with WHERE clause - Prisma generates non-partial version causing conflicts
protectedIndexes.recreateSQL: CREATE INDEX "memories_chunk_group_id_idx" ON "memories"("chunk_group_id") WHERE "chunk_group_id" IS NOT NULL;
